--------------------
Text: Amanda Donohoe:  For her role as C.J. Lamb on the NBC drama series "L.A. Law" (1990–92), she won the Golden Globe for Best Supporting Actress (TV) in 1992.
Triplets:<Amanda Donohoe
3:
--------------------
<Text: Amanda Donohoe:  Other television roles include playing Natasha Wylde on the British soap opera "Emmerdale" (2009–10).>
Triplets:<Amanda Donohoe
4:
--------------------
Text: Amanda Donohoe:  On stage, she starred as Yelena in "Uncle Vanya" (New York 1995), Mrs. Robinson in "The Graduate" (London 2001) and in the title role of "Hedda Gabler" (Manchester 2001).
